name: ORO & BORO
description:
Little game made for the #JIMJAM2, where you have to balance the dark side and the good side of a too kind guy.

Made in HTML5 and javascript. Code and all images have been made during the jam by myself. But sounds and sound fx have been downloaded

Credits:

- background sound: Visager-"factory time" http://freemusicarchive.org/tag/8-bit/

-sound fx: https://freesound.org/people/LittleRobotSoundFactory/sounds/270343/    https://freesound.org/people/LittleRobotSoundFactory/sounds/270341/
